Total Cost of Revenue: cost of goods and services sold

Income Before Taxes: foreign currency transaction gain loss before tax
Net Income: net income loss available to common stockholders basic

Other Income (Expense): gains losses on extinguishment of debt

Depreciation and Amortization: amortization of intangible assets excluding discontinued operations
Research and Development: research and development asset acquired other than through business combination written off
research and development expense excluding acquired in process cost

Basic EPS: income loss from continuing operations per basic share
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Bas: weighted average number of shares outstanding basic
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Dil: incremental common shares attributable to share based payment arrangements
weighted average number of diluted shares outstanding

Total Revenues: revenue from contract with customer excluding assessed tax

__unmapped__: antidilutive securities excluded from computation of earnings per share amount
common stock dividends per share declared
discontinued operation gain loss on disposal of discontinued operation net of tax
discontinued operation income loss from discontinued operation during phase out period net of tax
income loss from continuing operations including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax attributable to reporting entity
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax per basic share
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes and minority interest
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest
